trackMenu.documentation:
**Functional Purpose**: Link text to view the track's documentation.
**UI Location**: Track Menu dropdown, second item.
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the track options menu and the 'Documentation' link is available.
**Technical Context**: The variable `trackTitle` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "{trackTitle} documentation"
trackMenu.trackBuildStatus:
**Functional Purpose**: Link text to view the build status of the track.
**UI Location**: Track Menu dropdown, third item.
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the track options menu and the 'Track Build Status' link is available.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Track Build Status"
trackMenu.disableLearningMode:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to disable Learning Mode for a track.
**UI Location**: Track Menu dropdown, within a conditional list item.
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the track options menu and Learning Mode is currently active.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Disable Learning Mode…"
trackMenu.enableLearningMode:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to enable Learning Mode for a track.
**UI Location**: Track Menu dropdown, within a conditional list item.
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the track options menu and Learning Mode is currently inactive.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Enable Learning Mode…"
trackMenu.resetTrack:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to initiate the reset process for a track.
**UI Location**: Track Menu dropdown, within a conditional list item.
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the track options menu and the option to reset the track is available.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Reset track…"
trackMenu.leaveTrack:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to initiate the process of leaving a track.
**UI Location**: Track Menu dropdown, within a conditional list item.
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the track options menu and the option to leave the track is available.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Leave track…"
